title: Ray Ban Logo Font
content:
Hey Guys,  
Does anyone know the font used in the Ray Ban logo? Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/images_3563.jpeg)
author: dvann

comments.content:
Hi Russ,

that’s most likely a custom logo. You can try one of these:  
 [Kinescope](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040530/http:/ms-studio.com/FontSales/kinescope.html)  
 [Sable](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040530/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=665&subpage=viewfonts)  
 [Las Vegas Fabulous](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040530/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=27&subpage=viewfonts)  
 [BistroScript](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040530/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/suitcase/bistroscript_regular/?sample_text=Ray%20Ban)  
F

The RayBan logo comes directly from Native American glasses... I have seen them in the Nelson Atkins in Kansas City but I can't seem to find any pictures online. But I know that the tribe was not called "rayban" but the type they used looks almost identical to it.

So it's custom...
